name: zergRush
Details: Exploit causes the device to run like an emulator in order to call abd as root. The exploit then copies itself multiple times and creates a socket connection to a vulnerable module in Android 2.2 and 2.3. Shell code is sent to this vulnerable module which will be executed as root
Affected_versions: Android 2.2.x up to and including to 2.2.2, Android 2.3.x up to and including to 2.3.6
